author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-KAP Beteiligungs FY Normalised EBIT Up 57% At EUR 20.2 Million
text:
Feb 19 (Reuters) - KAP BETEILIGUNGS AG:
* FY GROUP REVENUE OF EUR409M (2016: EUR386M) * FY NORMALISED EBIT REPORTED AN INCREASE OF 57% TO EUR20.2M (2016: EUR12.9M)
* FY ‍REPORTED NORMALISED EBITDA OF EUR40.6M, A 19.1% INCREASE ON PREVIOUS YEAR (EUR34.1M)​
* 2018 MARGINS ARE EXPECTED TO IMPROVE WHILE EBITDA SHOULD CONTINUE TO GROW FROM CURRENT EUR40.6M LEVEL Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
